column18: Twelve hours on the field and she worked like a slave.
column19: 一天农作12小时，她忙如奴隶。
column20: She didnt make alotta money but the bills got paid.
column21: 她赚不了大钱，却仍要为家庭买单。
column22: Every day she dealt with pain and i've never seen her cry.
column23: 她每日困苦，却从未哭泣。
column24: And no matter how much it hurt it was our only way to survive.
column25: 不论伤痛，只因这是我们唯一的生存之道。
column26: And i'll never forget what you've done for me
column28: 我将永不忘她为我所付出的一切，
column29: and i do my best to make u proud of me.
column30: 我将拼尽全力令她为我自豪。

column34: she said: get a good job so u can raise  a family
